about_the_game:
Super modern and ultra trendy, this new music pack from Ayato Sound Create has lots of musical variety great for futuristic, post-apocalypse, high-tech themed games! With music for boss battles, events, different stages, featuring ultra-modern music production, cutting-edge synthesizers and drum slicing, loops, and EDM drop-in vocal cues, this pack will complement and give your modern and futuristic games all the vibes they need!

Features:

* 24 Ultra-modern and futuristic songs
* Music for boss battles, events, and different game stages
* .ogg, .mp3, .m4a and .wav formats included
* For use with Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

【stage】Lost galaxy
【stage】セイレーン(Siren)
【stage】デスドライブ(death drive)
【stage】遺棄されたコロニー（abandoned colony）
【stage】古の惑星(Ancient planet)
【stage】次元分断(Dimensional division)
【stage】出撃(Sorite)
【stage】星間飛行(Interstellar)
【stage】聖遺物（holy relic)
【stage】跳躍次元航法(Dimension jump)
【boss】異形(Variant)
【boss】巨大戦艦(Giant battleship)
【boss】空中戦(dog fight)
【boss】事象の地平面(Event horizon)
【boss】受肉する悪意(Malicious incarnation)
【event】1000年の孤独(1000 year of solitude)
【event】イデア(IDEA)
【event】インターミッション(Intermission)
【event】エラー(Error code)
【event】ヒト(Human)
【event】ファティマ(FATIMA)
【event】レクイエム(requiem)
【event】終焉（THE END)
【event】彗星を超えて（Beyond the comet
